description.narrative: Increased equitable access to early learning and basic education in development and humanitarian situations, which contributes to Early Learning, Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved equitable access, learning outcomes and completion of quality education by the end of 2017

title.narrative: Increased equitable access to early learning and basic education in development and humanitarian situations

description.narrative: With UNICEF support, 442,641 additional children enrolled in grade 1 in focus states and 54 per cent enrolled at 6 years. 904,578 children affected by crisis reached. ECD global campaign and awareness reached 85,257 in Nigeria. An impact evaluation of cash transfer programme and education needs assessment successfully completed. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2017
